name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
description: An introductory course covering AI, including neural networks and machine learning.

lessons.name: What is AI?
lessons.text: Introduction to the concept and applications of AI.

lessons.name: Machine Learning Basics
lessons.text: Exploring the basics of supervised and unsupervised learning.

lessons.name: Neural Networks
lessons.text: Understanding the structure and function of neural networks.

lessons.name: AI in Real-World Applications
lessons.text: Examining how AI is applied across industries.

lessons.name: Ethics in AI
lessons.text: Discussing the ethical implications of AI technology.

name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the foundations of modern web development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

lessons.name: Introduction to HTML
lessons.text: Learn about HTML and its role in web development.

lessons.name: CSS Basics
lessons.text: Discover how CSS styles web pages.

lessons.name: JavaScript Introduction
lessons.text: Understand JavaScript's role in building interactive websites.

lessons.name: DOM Manipulation
lessons.text: Learn how to modify HTML using JavaScript and the DOM.

lessons.name: Web Development Tools
lessons.text: Explore tools like VS Code, Git, and browser dev tools.

name: Data Science for Beginners
description: Learn how to work with data, analyze it, and create data visualizations.

lessons.name: Data Collection
lessons.text: Explore methods for collecting and storing data.

lessons.name: Data Cleaning
lessons.text: Learn how to clean and process raw data.

lessons.name: Data Analysis
lessons.text: Analyze data using basic statistical methods.

lessons.name: Data Visualization
lessons.text: Create data visualizations using common tools.

lessons.name: Reporting Results
lessons.text: Learn how to present data analysis results effectively.

name: Business Strategy 101
description: Learn the basics of strategic management, planning, and execution.

lessons.name: Introduction to Business Strategy
lessons.text: Understand the importance of a business strategy.

lessons.name: Market Analysis
lessons.text: Learn how to analyze market conditions and competition.

lessons.name: Strategic Planning
lessons.text: Discover how to create a long-term strategic plan.

lessons.name: Resource Management
lessons.text: Manage business resources effectively for long-term success.

lessons.name: Performance Evaluation
lessons.text: Measure business performance against strategic goals.

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Explore the art of creative writing through guided exercises and peer reviews.

lessons.name: Finding Your Voice
lessons.text: Discover how to find your unique writing style.

lessons.name: Developing Characters
lessons.text: Learn how to create believable and compelling characters.

lessons.name: Crafting Dialogue
lessons.text: Write realistic and engaging dialogue.

lessons.name: Plot Development
lessons.text: Understand how to build and maintain a compelling story arc.

lessons.name: Editing and Rewriting
lessons.text: Learn the process of editing and improving your work.
